title: How to Install an ARIES 3" Bull Bar on 2015 Toyota Tundra
description: Get step-by-step instructions on how to install this must-have off-road accessory.
tags: Aries, Bull Bar, Toyota Tundra, 2015, install

asset.title: ARIES Bull Bar Install: 3" Bull Bar 35-2004 on 2015 Toyota Tundra
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES 35-2004 3" Bull Bars on a 2015 Toyota Tundra.  This bull bar is available in a high-gloss black powder coat, semi-gloss black powder coat, textured black, or 304 stainless steel finish.

Features Include:
Allows for addition of aftermarket lights
Removable skid plate
No-drill application

Vehicle Coverage:
2007-2015 Toyota Tundra
2008-2015 Toyota Sequoia

Part #
35-2004 (Stainless Steel Finish)
B35-2004 (Semi-Gloss Black Powder Coat Finish)
B35-2004-3 (High-Gloss Black Powder Coat Finish)
P35-2004 (Textured Black Powder Coat Finish)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
